name: sample-e-commerce
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with Node.js/Express backend and React frontend

scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.test: npm run server:test && npm run client:test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules server/dist client/build
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start the application.'
